definition: to kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more

sentences.english: We should not be soft-hearted towards those who killed people and seized their goods.
sentences.chinese: 我们对那些杀人越货的家伙不要心慈手软。

sentences.english: I knew every spot where a murder or robbery had been committed, or a ghost seen.
sentences.chinese: 我知道那里的每一处杀人越货之所与鬼神出没之地。

sentences.english: The conquerors advanced,killing and plundering wherever they went.
sentences.chinese: 征服者一路上杀人越货无所不为。

definition: to kill and burn (idiom); murder and arson
to break into a house for robbery (idiom)
to imitate the dog and steal chicken (idiom)/to pilfer/to dally with women/to have affairs
to oppress the people/to act tyrannically
(of a villain) to do the dirty on another villain
not to shrink from any crime (idiom); to commit any imaginable misdeed
